name: HERITAGE CULTURE ART AND EDUCATION DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY OF RATNAGIRI
briefDescription: Working on the issues of Health, Empowerment,Capacity Development, Gender Equality,Education,Environment in Ratnagiri District from the year1994  Vision - Creation of Violence free & peaceful society based on the values of Equality, Humanity,morality ,Social justice and equal opportunities .Mission-Heritage will ful-fil its vision by involving Active participation of children , youth and women problem. It will empower them by forming group and capacity building .It will focus on Imparting quality education ,educating them on right,holistic health ,gender equity, environment restoration & regeneration.It will make confident & self reliant by Imitating people central development process.
